Velocity.name:
Velocity                                                                                                    // 10
/                                                                                                                    // 11
/**                                                                                                                    // 12
The `Velocity` object provides a common API for test frameworks to report                                           // 13
test results.  Frameworks can also request assets, such as a copy of the                                            // 14
user's application (the 'mirror') in which tests can be safely run without                                          // 15
impacting on-going development.                                                                                     // 16
                                                                                                                    // 17
Test results and log activity are reported via                                                                      // 18
{{#crossLink "Meteor.methods"}}Meteor methods{{/crossLink}}.                                                        // 19
                                                                                                                    // 20

return.description: A future that can be used in meteor methods (or for other async needs)                           // 725

params.name: preprocessor
reporter
name
params.description: The name of the testing framework.                                 // 154

props.name: disableAutoReset
props.description:
Velocity's reset cycle will skip reports and logs for this framework
                                           It will be the responsibility of the framework to clean up its ****!

props.name: regex
props.description:
The regular expression for test files that should be assigned      // 158
                                           to the testing framework.                                          // 159
                                           The path relative to the tests                                     // 160
                                           folder is matched against it.                                      // 161
                                           The default is "name/.+\.js$"                                      // 162
                                           (name is the testing framework name).                              // 163

props.name: sampleTestGenerator
props.description:
sampleTestGenerator                                             // 164
   returns an array of fileObjects with the following fields:                                                 // 165

props.name: path
props.description: relative path to place test file (from PROJECT/tests)        // 166

props.name: contents

props.description:
The name of a specific framework                                            // 205
                 to clear results for.  Ex. 'jasmine' or 'mocha'                                                // 206

A list of test Ids which should be kept                                          // 207
                               (not cleared).  These Ids must match the                                         // 208
                               ones passed to `velocity/reports/submit`.                                        // 209
/                                                                                                                // 210
   'velocity/reports/reset': function (options) {                                                                     // 211
     options = options || {};                                                                                         // 212
     check(options, {                                                                                                 // 213
       framework: Match.Optional(String),                                                                             // 214
       notIn: Match.Optional([String])                                                                                // 215
     });                                                                                                              // 216
                                                                                                                      // 217
     var query = {};                                                                                                  // 218
     if (options.framework) {                                                                                         // 219
       query.framework = options.framework;                                                                           // 220
     }                                                                                                                // 221
     if (options.notIn) {                                                                                             // 222
       query = _.assign(query, {_id: {$nin: options.notIn}});                                                         // 223
     }                                                                                                                // 224
     VelocityTestReports.remove(query);                                                                               // 225
     _updateAggregateReports();                                                                                       // 226
   },                                                                                                                 // 227
                                                                                                                      // 228
                                                                                                                      // 229
   /**                                                                                                                // 230
Clear all log entries.                                                                                          // 231
                                                                                                                // 232

The name of a specific framework                                            // 235
                                    to clear logs for.                                                          // 236
/                                                                                                                // 237

     options = options || {};                                                                                         // 239

       framework: Match.Optional(String)                                                                              // 241
     });                                                                                                              // 242
                                                                                                                      // 243
     var query = {};                                                                                                  // 244
     if (options.framework) {                                                                                         // 245
       query.framework = options.framework;                                                                           // 246
     }                                                                                                                // 247

   },                                                                                                                 // 249
                                                                                                                      // 250
                                                                                                                      // 251
   /**                                                                                                                // 252
Log a message to the Velocity log store.  This provides a central                                               // 253
location for different reporters to query for test framework log                                                // 254
entries.                                                                                                        // 255
                                                                                                                // 256
The name of the test framework                                                // 259
The message to log                                                              // 260
Log level.  Ex. 'error'. Default: 'info'                                        // 261

// 262
/                                                                                                                // 263
   'velocity/logs/submit': function (options) {                                                                       // 264
     check(options, {                                                                                                 // 265
       framework: String,                                                                                             // 266
       message: String,                                                                                               // 267
       level: Match.Optional(String),                                                                                 // 268
       timestamp: Match.Optional(Match.OneOf(Date, String))                                                           // 269
     });                                                                                                              // 270
                                                                                                                      // 271
     VelocityLogs.insert({                                                                                            // 272
       timestamp: options.timestamp || new Date(),                                                                    // 273
       level: options.level || 'info',                                                                                // 274
       message: options.message,                                                                                      // 275
       framework: options.framework                                                                                   // 276
     });                                                                                                              // 277
   },                                                                                                                 // 278

   /**                                                                                                                // 281
Record the results of an individual test run; a simple collector of                                             // 282
test data.                                                                                                      // 283
                                                                                                                // 284
The `data` object is stored in its entirety; any field may be passed in.                                        // 285
The optional fields documented here are suggestions based on what the                                           // 286
standard html-reporter supports.  Whether or not a field is actually                                            // 287
used is up to the specific test reporter that the user has installed.                                           // 288
                                                                                                                // 289

props.name: name
props.description: Name of the test that was executed.                                                   // 292

props.name: framework
props.description:
Name of a testing framework.                                                     // 293
                               For example, 'jasmine' or 'mocha'.                                               // 294

props.name: result
props.description:
The results of the test.  Standard values                                           // 295
                            are 'passed' and 'failed'.  Different test                                          // 296
                            reporters can support other values.  For                                            // 297
                            example, the aggregate tests collection uses                                        // 298
                            'pending' to indicate that results are still                                        // 299
                            coming in.                                                                          // 300

props.name: id
props.description:
Used to update a specific test result.  If not                                        // 301
                          provided, frameworks can use the                                                      // 302
                          `velocity/reports/reset` Meteor method to                                             // 303
                          clear all tests.                                                                      // 304

props.name: ancestors
props.description:
The hierarchy of suites and blocks above                                        // 305
                                this test. For example,                                                         // 306
                             ['Template', 'leaderboard', 'selected_name']                                       // 307

props.name: timestamp
props.description:
The time that the test started for this                                          // 308
                               result.                                                                          // 309

props.name: duration
props.description: The test duration in milliseconds.                                              // 310

props.name: browser
props.description: Which browser did the test run in?                                               // 311

props.name: failureType
props.description: For example, 'expect' or 'assert'                                            // 312

props.name: failureStackTrace
props.description:
The stack trace associated with                                        // 314
                                         the failure                                                            // 315
/                                                                                                                // 316
   'velocity/reports/submit': function (data) {                                                                       // 317
     check(data, Match.ObjectIncluding({                                                                              // 318
       name: String,                                                                                                  // 319
       framework: String,                                                                                             // 320
       result: String,                                                                                                // 321
       id: Match.Optional(String),                                                                                    // 322
       ancestors: Match.Optional([String]),                                                                           // 323
       timestamp: Match.Optional(Match.OneOf(Date, String)),                                                          // 324
       duration: Match.Optional(Number),                                                                              // 325
       browser: Match.Optional(String),                                                                               // 326
       failureType: Match.Optional(String),                                                                           // 327
       failureMessage: Match.Optional(String),                                                                        // 328
       failureStackTrace: Match.Optional(Match.Any)                                                                   // 329
     }));                                                                                                             // 330
                                                                                                                      // 331
     data.timestamp = data.timestamp || new Date();                                                                   // 332
     data.id = data.id || Random.id();                                                                                // 333
                                                                                                                      // 334
     VelocityTestReports.upsert(data.id, {$set: data});                                                               // 335
                                                                                                                      // 336
     _updateAggregateReports();                                                                                       // 337
   },  // end postResult                                                                                              // 338

   /**                                                                                                                // 341
Frameworks must call this method to inform Velocity they have completed                                         // 342
their current test runs. Velocity uses this flag when running in CI mode.                                       // 343
                                                                                                                // 344

Name of a test framework.  Ex. 'jasmine'                                         // 347
/                                                                                                                // 348
   'velocity/reports/completed': function (data) {                                                                    // 349
     check(data, {                                                                                                    // 350
       framework: String                                                                                              // 351

                                                                                                                      // 353

                                     {$set: {'result': 'completed'}});                                                // 355
     _updateAggregateReports();                                                                                       // 356
   },  // end completed                                                                                               // 357

   /**                                                                                                                // 360
Copy sample tests from frameworks `sample-tests` directories                                                    // 361
to the user's application's `tests` directory.                                                                  // 362
                                                                                                                // 363

Framework name. Ex. 'jasmine', 'mocha'                                        // 367
/                                                                                                                // 368
   'velocity/copySampleTests': function (options) {                                                                   // 369
     var sampleTests,                                                                                                 // 370
         samplesPath,                                                                                                 // 371
         testsPath,                                                                                                   // 372
         command;                                                                                                     // 373
                                                                                                                      // 374
     options = options || {};                                                                                         // 375
     check(options, {                                                                                                 // 376
       framework: String                                                                                              // 377
     });                                                                                                              // 378
                                                                                                                      // 379
     if (_config[options.framework].sampleTestGenerator) {                                                            // 380
                                                                                                                      // 381
       sampleTests = _config[options.framework].sampleTestGenerator(options);                                         // 382
                                                                                                                      // 383
       DEBUG && console.log('[velocity] found ', sampleTests.length,                                                  // 384
                            'sample test files for', options.framework);                                              // 385
                                                                                                                      // 386
       sampleTests.forEach(function (testFile) {                                                                      // 387
         var fullTestPath = path.join(Velocity.getTestsPath(), testFile.path);                                        // 388
         var testDir = path.dirname(fullTestPath);                                                                    // 389
         mkdirp.sync(testDir);                                                                                        // 390
         fs.writeFileSync(fullTestPath, testFile.contents);                                                           // 391
       });                                                                                                            // 392
                                                                                                                      // 393
     } else {                                                                                                         // 394
                                                                                                                      // 395
       samplesPath = path.join(Velocity.getAppPath(), 'packages',                                                     // 396
                               options.framework, 'sample-tests');                                                    // 397
       testsPath = Velocity.getTestsPath();                                                                           // 398
                                                                                                                      // 399
       DEBUG && console.log('[velocity] checking for sample tests in',                                                // 400
                             path.join(samplesPath, '*'));                                                            // 401
                                                                                                                      // 402
       if (fs.existsSync(samplesPath)) {                                                                              // 403
         command = 'mkdir -p ' + testsPath + ' && ' +                                                                 // 404
                   'rsync -au ' + path.join(samplesPath, '*') +                                                       // 405
                   ' ' + testsPath + path.sep;                                                                        // 406
                                                                                                                      // 407
         DEBUG && console.log('[velocity] copying sample tests (if any) ' +                                           // 408
                              'for framework', options.framework, '-',                                                // 409
                              command);                                                                               // 410
                                                                                                                      // 411
         child_process.exec(command, Meteor.bindEnvironment(                                                          // 412
           function copySampleTestsExecHandler (err, stdout, stderr) {                                                // 413
             if (err) {                                                                                               // 414
               console.error('ERROR', err);                                                                           // 415
             }                                                                                                        // 416
             console.log(stdout);                                                                                     // 417
             console.error(stderr);                                                                                   // 418
           },                                                                                                         // 419
           'copySampleTestsExecHandler'                                                                               // 420
         ));                                                                                                          // 421
       }                                                                                                              // 422
                                                                                                                      // 423
     }                                                                                                                // 424
   },  // end copySampleTests                                                                                         // 425

The name of the calling framework                                      // 438
Array of files with absolute paths                                     // 439
String use a specific port                                             // 440

Adds this string to the end of the root url in the VelocityMirrors collection.
                                         eg. `/?jasmine=true`                                                   // 443

Required fields:                                                                          // 532

Called with (error, result) where error is the exception and result is the status code // 723

props.description:
The name of the target framework                                            // 15
                                        for which the tests should be copied                                        // 16
                                        to the mirror.                                                              // 17

Callback that is called after a                                             // 18
                                        file was added.                                                             // 19

Callback that is called after a                                           // 20
                                          file has changed.                                                         // 21

Callback that is called after a                                           // 22
                                          file was removed.                                                         // 23

Control whether a file is copied.                                            // 24
                                       Passed the file object from the                                              // 25
                                       VelocityTestFiles collection which                                           // 26
                                       has a `absolutePath` field.                                                  // 27
                                       Default: true                                                                // 28

A function that converts the                                // 29
                                                        test file path to the mirror path.                          // 30
                                                                                                                    // 31

example:
// 32
    var fileCopier = new Velocity.FileCopier({                                                                      // 33
      targetFramework: TEST_FRAMEWORK_NAME                                                                          // 34
    });                                                                                                             // 35
    fileCopier.start();                                                                                             // 36
/                                                                                                                    // 37
Velocity.FileCopier = function VelocityFileCopier(options) {                                                           // 38
 check(options, {                                                                                                     // 39
   targetFramework: String,                                                                                           // 40
   onFileAdded: Match.Optional(Function),                                                                             // 41
   onFileChanged: Match.Optional(Function),                                                                           // 42
   onFileRemoved: Match.Optional(Function),                                                                           // 43
   shouldCopy: Match.Optional(Function),                                                                              // 44
   convertTestPathToMirrorPath: Match.Optional(Function)                                                              // 45
 });                                                                                                                  // 46
 this.options = _.extend({                                                                                            // 47
   onFileAdded: _.noop,                                                                                               // 48
   onFileChanged: _.noop,                                                                                             // 49
   onFileRemoved: _.noop,                                                                                             // 50
   shouldCopy: function () { return true; },                                                                          // 51
   convertTestPathToMirrorPath: this._defaultConvertTestPathToMirrorPath                                              // 52
 }, options);                                                                                                         // 53
};                                                                                                                     // 54
                                                                                                                      // 55
_.extend(Velocity.FileCopier.prototype, {                                                                              // 56
                                                                                                                      // 57
 /**                                                                                                                  // 58
Starts copying files to the mirror.                                                                               // 59
                                                                                                                  // 60
Velocity.memberof:
Velocity.FileCopier.prototype                                                                           // 85
/                                                                                                                  // 86
 stop: function () {                                                                                                  // 87
   this._observer.stop();                                                                                             // 88
   this._observer = null;                                                                                             // 89
 },                                                                                                                   // 90
                                                                                                                      // 91
 _onFileAdded: function (newFile) {                                                                                   // 92
   if (this.options.shouldCopy(newFile)) {                                                                            // 93
     this._replaceFileInMirror(newFile);                                                                              // 94
     this.options.onFileAdded(newFile);                                                                               // 95
   }                                                                                                                  // 96
 },                                                                                                                   // 97
                                                                                                                      // 98
 _onFileChanged: function (newFile, oldFile) {                                                                        // 99
   if (this.options.shouldCopy(oldFile)) {                                                                            // 100
     // Remove the oldFile in case the absolutePath has changed                                                       // 101
     this._removeFileFromMirror(oldFile);                                                                             // 102
   }                                                                                                                  // 103
   if (this.options.shouldCopy(newFile)) {                                                                            // 104
     this._replaceFileInMirror(newFile);                                                                              // 105
     this.options.onFileAdded(oldFile, newFile);                                                                      // 106
   }                                                                                                                  // 107
 },                                                                                                                   // 108
                                                                                                                      // 109
 _onFileRemoved: function (removedFile) {                                                                             // 110
   this._removeFileFromMirror(removedFile);                                                                           // 111
   this.options.onFileRemoved(removedFile);                                                                           // 112
 },                                                                                                                   // 113
                                                                                                                      // 114
 _removeFileFromMirror: function (file) {                                                                             // 115
   var mirrorFilePath = this._convertTestPathToMirrorPath(file.absolutePath);                                         // 116
   DEBUG && console.log('[Velocity.FileCopier] Remove file from mirror', mirrorFilePath);                             // 117
   removeFile(mirrorFilePath);                                                                                        // 118
 },                                                                                                                   // 119
                                                                                                                      // 120
 _replaceFileInMirror: function (file) {                                                                              // 121
   var self = this;                                                                                                   // 122
                                                                                                                      // 123
   var mirrorFilePath = self._convertTestPathToMirrorPath(file.absolutePath);                                         // 124
   DEBUG && console.log('[Velocity.FileCopier] Replace file in mirror', mirrorFilePath);                              // 125
   copyFile(file.absolutePath, mirrorFilePath);                                                                       // 126
 },                                                                                                                   // 127
                                                                                                                      // 128
 _isInTestsPath: function _isInTestsPath(filePath) {                                                                  // 129
   var testsPath = Velocity.getTestsPath();                                                                           // 130
   return filePath.substr(0, testsPath.length) === testsPath;                                                         // 131
 },                                                                                                                   // 132
                                                                                                                      // 133
 _convertTestPathToMirrorPath: function (filePath) {                                                                  // 134
   if (!this._isInTestsPath(filePath)) {                                                                              // 135
     throw new Error('[Velocity.FileCopier] Path "' + filePath + '" is not in the tests path.');                      // 136
   }                                                                                                                  // 137
                                                                                                                      // 138
   filePath = filePath.substr(Velocity.getTestsPath().length);                                                        // 139
   filePath = this.options.convertTestPathToMirrorPath.call(this, filePath);                                          // 140
                                                                                                                      // 141
   return Velocity.getMirrorPath() + filePath;                                                                        // 142
 },                                                                                                                   // 143
                                                                                                                      // 144
 _defaultConvertTestPathToMirrorPath: function (filePath) {                                                           // 145
   var targetFramework = this.options.targetFramework;                                                                // 146
   filePath = filePath.replace(targetFramework + '/client', 'client/' + targetFramework);                             // 147
   filePath = filePath.replace(targetFramework + '/server', 'server/' + targetFramework);                             // 148
                                                                                                                      // 149
   return filePath                                                                                                    // 150
 }                                                                                                                    // 151
});                                                                                                                    // 152

   'velocity/copySampleTests': function (options) {                                                                   // 369
     var sampleTests,                                                                                                 // 370
         samplesPath,                                                                                                 // 371
         testsPath,                                                                                                   // 372
         command;                                                                                                     // 373
                                                                                                                      // 374
     options = options || {};                                                                                         // 375
     check(options, {                                                                                                 // 376
       framework: String                                                                                              // 377
     });                                                                                                              // 378
                                                                                                                      // 379
     if (_config[options.framework].sampleTestGenerator) {                                                            // 380
                                                                                                                      // 381
       sampleTests = _config[options.framework].sampleTestGenerator(options);                                         // 382
                                                                                                                      // 383
       DEBUG && console.log('[velocity] found ', sampleTests.length,                                                  // 384
                            'sample test files for', options.framework);                                              // 385
                                                                                                                      // 386
       sampleTests.forEach(function (testFile) {                                                                      // 387
         var fullTestPath = path.join(Velocity.getTestsPath(), testFile.path);                                        // 388
         var testDir = path.dirname(fullTestPath);                                                                    // 389
         mkdirp.sync(testDir);                                                                                        // 390
         fs.writeFileSync(fullTestPath, testFile.contents);                                                           // 391
       });                                                                                                            // 392
                                                                                                                      // 393
     } else {                                                                                                         // 394
                                                                                                                      // 395
       samplesPath = path.join(Velocity.getAppPath(), 'packages',                                                     // 396
                               options.framework, 'sample-tests');                                                    // 397
       testsPath = Velocity.getTestsPath();                                                                           // 398
                                                                                                                      // 399
       DEBUG && console.log('[velocity] checking for sample tests in',                                                // 400
                             path.join(samplesPath, '*'));                                                            // 401
                                                                                                                      // 402
       if (fs.existsSync(samplesPath)) {                                                                              // 403
         command = 'mkdir -p ' + testsPath + ' && ' +                                                                 // 404
                   'rsync -au ' + path.join(samplesPath, '*') +                                                       // 405
                   ' ' + testsPath + path.sep;                                                                        // 406
                                                                                                                      // 407
         DEBUG && console.log('[velocity] copying sample tests (if any) ' +                                           // 408
                              'for framework', options.framework, '-',                                                // 409
                              command);                                                                               // 410
                                                                                                                      // 411
         child_process.exec(command, Meteor.bindEnvironment(                                                          // 412
           function copySampleTestsExecHandler (err, stdout, stderr) {                                                // 413
             if (err) {                                                                                               // 414
               console.error('ERROR', err);                                                                           // 415
             }                                                                                                        // 416
             console.log(stdout);                                                                                     // 417
             console.error(stderr);                                                                                   // 418
           },                                                                                                         // 419
           'copySampleTestsExecHandler'                                                                               // 420
         ));                                                                                                          // 421
       }                                                                                                              // 422
                                                                                                                      // 423
     }                                                                                                                // 424
   },  // end copySampleTests                                                                                         // 425

Velocity.name: Velocity
Velocity.description:
The `Velocity` object provides a common API for test frameworks to report
test results.  Frameworks can also request assets, such as a copy of the
user's application (the 'mirror') in which tests can be safely run without
impacting on-going development.

Test results and log activity are reported via 
{{#crossLink "Meteor.methods"}}Meteor methods{{/crossLink}}.

Add a callback which will execute when the mirror application
is sync'ed up with latest application code.  Preprocessors will
execute before fixtures are added.

Add a callback which will execute after all tests have completed

classitems.description: Registers a testing framework plugin.
classitems.name: registerTestingFramework

params.name: name
params.description: The name of the testing framework.

props.name: disableAutoReset
props.description:
Velocity's reset cycle will skip reports and logs for this framework
                                           It will be the responsibility of the framework to clean up its ****!

props.name: regex
props.description:
The regular expression for test files that should be assigned
                                           to the testing framework.
                                           The path relative to the tests
                                           folder is matched against it.
                                           The default is "name/.+\.js$"
                                           (name is the testing framework name).

props.name: sampleTestGenerator
props.description:
sampleTestGenerator
   returns an array of fileObjects with the following fields:

props.name: path
props.description: relative path to place test file (from PROJECT/tests)

props.name: contents
props.description: contents of the test file the path that's returned

classitems.description: Re-init file watcher and clear all test results.
classitems.name: velocity/reset

classitems.description: Clear all test results.
classitems.name: velocity/reports/reset

props.name: framework
props.description:
The name of a specific framework
                 to clear results for.  Ex. 'jasmine' or 'mocha'

props.name: notIn
props.description:
A list of test Ids which should be kept
                               (not cleared).  These Ids must match the
                               ones passed to `velocity/reports/submit`.

classitems.description: Clear all log entries.
classitems.name: velocity/logs/reset

props.name: framework
props.description:
The name of a specific framework
                                    to clear logs for.

classitems.description:
Log a message to the Velocity log store.  This provides a central
location for different reporters to query for test framework log 
entries.
classitems.name: velocity/logs/submit

props.name: framework
props.description: The name of the test framework

props.name: message
props.description: The message to log

props.name: level
props.description: Log level.  Ex. 'error'. Default: 'info'

classitems.description:
Record the results of an individual test run; a simple collector of
test data.

The `data` object is stored in its entirety; any field may be passed in.
The optional fields documented here are suggestions based on what the
standard html-reporter supports.  Whether or not a field is actually
used is up to the specific test reporter that the user has installed.
classitems.name: velocity/reports/submit

props.name: name
props.description: Name of the test that was executed.

props.name: framework
props.description:
Name of a testing framework.
                               For example, 'jasmine' or 'mocha'.

props.name: result
props.description:
The results of the test.  Standard values
                            are 'passed' and 'failed'.  Different test
                            reporters can support other values.  For
                            example, the aggregate tests collection uses
                            'pending' to indicate that results are still
                            coming in.

props.name: id
props.description:
Used to update a specific test result.  If not
                          provided, frameworks can use the
                          `velocity/reports/reset` Meteor method to
                          clear all tests.

props.name: ancestors
props.description:
The hierarchy of suites and blocks above
                                this test. For example,
                             ['Template', 'leaderboard', 'selected_name']

props.name: timestamp
props.description:
The time that the test started for this
                               result.

props.name: duration
props.description: The test duration in milliseconds.

props.name: browser
props.description: Which browser did the test run in?

props.name: failureType
props.description: For example, 'expect' or 'assert'

props.name: failureStackTrace
props.description:
The stack trace associated with
                                         the failure

classitems.description:
Frameworks must call this method to inform Velocity they have completed
their current test runs. Velocity uses this flag when running in CI mode.
classitems.name: velocity/reports/completed

props.name: framework
props.description: Name of a test framework.  Ex. 'jasmine'

classitems.description:
Copy sample tests from frameworks `sample-tests` directories
to the user's application's `tests` directory.
classitems.name: velocity/copySampleTests

props.name: framework
props.description: Framework name. Ex. 'jasmine', 'mocha'

classitems.description:
Starts a new mirror if it has not already been started, and reuses an
existing one if it is already started.

This method will update the `VelocityMirrors` collection with `requestId`
once the mirror is ready for use.
classitems.name: velocity/mirrors/request

props.name: framework
props.description: The name of the calling framework

props.name: fixtureFiles
props.description: Array of files with absolute paths

props.name: port
props.description: String use a specific port

props.name: requestId
props.description: Id for the mirror that may be used to query the mirror for status info

props.name: rootUrlPath
props.description:
Adds this string to the end of the root url in the VelocityMirrors collection.
                                         eg. `/?jasmine=true`
                                         Request parameters that velocity-ci uses.

return.description: The `requestId` that can be used to query the mirror

classitems.description: Exposes the IS_MIRROR flag to clients
classitems.name: velocity/isMirror

return.description: true if currently running in mirror

classitems.description:
Syncs the mirror filesystem on an adhoc basis.
Used by the core when file changes are detected.
classitems.name: velocity/syncMirror

classitems.description: Starts a mirror and copies any specified fixture files into the mirror.
classitems.name: velocityStartMirror

params.name: options
params.description:
Required fields:
                  framework - String ex. 'mocha-web-1'
                  rootUrl - String ex. 'http://localhost:5000/x=y'

                Optional parameters:
                  fixtureFiles - Array of files with absolute paths
                  port - String use a specific port instead of finding the next available one

classitems.description: Reuses a mirror is it has already been started and updated the VelocityMirrors collection
classitems.name: _reuseExistingMirror

params.name: options
params.description:
Required fields:
                  framework - String ex. 'mocha-web-1'
                  port - String use a specific port
                  requestId - the request id to put in the mirror metadata
